text: The Good American Family Episode 5 release date and time is right around the corner, and many are eager to find out the streaming details. The previous episodes focused on Kristine, whose suspicions about Natalia’s identity continue to grow. Therefore, she plans to investigate her age and discover shocking details. On the other hand, Michael’s lies continue to increase, causing trouble in their family. Additionally, the couple also seems to have varied opinions on Natalia, which strains their relationship further. When things take an unexpected turn, Kristine decides to take a stand. Here’s everything you need to know about the upcoming episode. When is the Good American Family Episode 5 release date & time? The episode’s release date is April 9, 2025, and its release time is 12 am PT, 3 am ET. Check out its release times in the U.S. below: TimezoneRelease DateRelease TimeEastern TimeApril 9, 202503:00 AMPacific TimeApril 9, 202512:00 AM Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in Good American Family. Where to watch Good American Family Episode 5 You can watch Good American Family Episode 5 via Hulu. Hulu is a well-known streaming service that consists of original programming as well as third-party content. It runs numerous shows and movies from various production companies, such as Lionsgate, NBCUniversal, Sony Pictures, and more. What is Good American Family about? Good American Family is a drama series that focuses on a couple adopting a girl named Natalia with rare dwarfism. However, things turn upside down when they learn about her real identity. The official synopsis for Good American Family is as follows: “A Midwestern couple adopts who they believe to be a little girl with dwarfism but gradually started to believe she may not be who she said she was.”
html:
The Good American Family Episode 5 release date and time is right around the corner, and many are eager to find out the streaming details.

The previous episodes focused on Kristine, whose suspicions about Natalia’s identity continue to grow. Therefore, she plans to investigate her age and discover shocking details. On the other hand, Michael’s lies continue to increase, causing trouble in their family. Additionally, the couple also seems to have varied opinions on Natalia, which strains their relationship further. When things take an unexpected turn, Kristine decides to take a stand.

Here’s everything you need to know about the upcoming episode.

When is the Good American Family Episode 5 release date & time?

The episode’s release date is April 9, 2025, and its release time is 12 am PT, 3 am ET.

Check out its release times in the U.S. below:

Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in Good American Family.

Where to watch Good American Family Episode 5

You can watch Good American Family Episode 5 via Hulu.

Hulu is a well-known streaming service that consists of original programming as well as third-party content. It runs numerous shows and movies from various production companies, such as Lionsgate, NBCUniversal, Sony Pictures, and more.

What is Good American Family about?

Good American Family is a drama series that focuses on a couple adopting a girl named Natalia with rare dwarfism. However, things turn upside down when they learn about her real identity.

The official synopsis for Good American Family is as follows:

“A Midwestern couple adopts who they believe to be a little girl with dwarfism but gradually started to believe she may not be who she said she was.”
